subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Beckett returned from the disabled list last night and won his eighth consecutive decision, pitching seven innings of three-hit ball to lead the Boston Red Sox to a 4-2 victory over the visiting Cleveland Indians.
snippet: Josh Beckett returned from the disabled list last night and won his eighth consecutive decision, pitching seven innings of three-hit ball to lead the Boston Red Sox to a 4-2 victory over the visiting Cleveland Indians.
